Hummingbat Swarm

5 HP, 5 STR, 15 DEX, scratch (d4), detachment

• Moves rapidly on its fluttering wings and always acts first.

• Blind but uses echolocation and has perfect hearing.

• Very territorial and won't leave its nesting grounds or chase unless provoked but shriek loudly to fend off.

genre:
